Module com.example.project4ruburger
Package com.example.project4ruburger.model

Class Order

java.lang.Object
com.example.project4ruburger.model.Order
public class Order extends Object
This class represents an order made my the customer. It gets the order number for each order, starts a new order, adds/removes items from the order, updates the dynamic price and calculates the total price of the order using the subtotal and NJ sales tax.
